;;; TOOL: run-roundtrip
;;; ARGS: --stdout --enable-reference-types
(module
  (table $t 0 funcref)
  (table $u 0 funcref)

  (func
    i32.const 0
    i32.const 0
    i32.const 0
    table.copy $t $u)
)
(;; STDOUT ;;;
(module
  (type (;0;) (func))
  (func (;0;) (type 0)
    i32.const 0
    i32.const 0
    i32.const 0
    table.copy 0 1)
  (table (;0;) 0 funcref)
  (table (;1;) 0 funcref))
;;; STDOUT ;;)
